# Submission Checklist

## On-Chain Proof
- [ ] ERC-8004 contracts deployed to BSC Testnet
- [ ] Contract addresses verified on BSCScan
- [ ] Demo transaction hashes recorded in HACKATHON.md
- [ ] Agent registration TX visible on explorer

## Reproducibility
- [ ] `git clone` + `npm install` + `npm start` works
- [ ] Demo script runs: `cd demo && npm run demo`
- [ ] Agent runtime starts: `cd agent-runtime && npm run start:dev`
- [ ] MCP server starts: `cd mcp-servers/bnbchain-mcp && npm start`
- [ ] Live demo accessible: bnb-chain-toolkit.vercel.app

## Submission Materials
- [ ] HACKATHON.md complete with all proof
- [ ] Repository is public
- [ ] README has clear getting-started instructions
- [ ] AI Build Log section filled in (bonus points)
- [ ] No token launch / no fundraising

## DoraHacks
- [ ] Project registered on DoraHacks
- [ ] Track selected: Agent (AI Agent Ã— Onchain Actions)
- [ ] Description links to repo and demo
- [ ] Contract addresses listed
